entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:52 p.m. MST Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with a few flurries. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains late this evening and overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 12 April 2023
